title: GTA Trilogy Pulled From PC, Rockstar Launcher Broken  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.12.21
description:
Blessing and Janet talk about a Halo Infinite rumor, GTA Trilogy's PC release, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Our Disney Plus Day reactions are up on Youtube. That’s Tim, Joey, Kev, Andy, and Nick reacting to all of the Disney Plus Day announcements including She Hulk, Moon Knight, and more. That’s over on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:03:50 - GTA Trilogy Pulled For PC and the Rockstar Launcher is Broken - John Walker @ Kotaku
00:15:30 - Halo Infinite multiplayer rumor says it will launch early for Halo's 20th anniversary - Connor Sheridan @ GamesRadar
00:29:18 - 1 vs. 100 is in the works at Microsoft - Jeff Grubb @ Games Beat
00:25:10 - Ad
00:39:27 - Assassin’s Creed’s lead writer has returned to Ubisoft - Andy Robinson @VGC
00:43:44 - Far Cry’s boss has left Ubisoft - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:51:40 - Out today
00:54:07 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Mon: Blessing and Tim
Tues: Tim and Gary
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thursday: Tam and Tim
Fri: Blessing and Janet
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
